contest-event.event-date:
April 25, 1970 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Recollections of Balfe
Civic Hall, Holmfirth March contest 1st Slaithwaite(91), 2nd Lockwood(90). Hymn Tune contest 1st Slaithwaite(46), 2nd Hade Edge (43). 11 bands competed.
April 4, 2012, 8:47 p.m. March 26, 2013, 12:08 p.m.
1 Hade Edge Jack Fisher
2 Slaithwaite Band Derek Broadbent
3 Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band Douglas Broadhead
4 Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Maurice Wadsworth
Unknown Result Emley Brass Band Unknown
Unknown Result Honley Silver Band Frank Gledhill
Unknown Result Linthwaite Silver Band John Iredale
Unknown Result Skelmanthorpe Band A. P. Bell
